You may choose from:
1) Unlock basic activation of Abeyance.
» -5% damage from Abeyance (-1% per Form and Inertia), up to -45%.
» +2% to all Resistances.
2) Learn the Adaptation skill.
» Adaptation activates, granting 3 stacks, when you perform Flurry, All In, Staff of Magus, or Sucker Punch.
3) +2 Maximum Adaptation stacks.
» +14% invested Memory.
4) +15% summon Maximum Vitality.
» +0.6 summon Movement Speed.

Thank you Ameranth and Elric for making such an excellent overhaul.

You may choose from:
1) Adaptation grants +2% missing Vitality, Physical, and Magic Armor regeneration.
2) If you have 5 or more stacks of Adaptation when you perform an Occultist reaction, lose 2 stacks of Adaptation and emulate the effects of Throw Dust that only harms enemies.
3) Conjure Incarnate summons an Incarnate Champion. Incarnate spawns with each memorized non-elemental Infusion.
» +4 Memory.
4) If you do not already have this benefit, increase your summon limit by 1.

You may choose from:
1) Once per round, when Vitality Void hits 3 or more targets, extend your Source Generation by 1 turn.

» Once per round, per target, any non-zero amount of damage you deal applies two stacks of Battered and Harried.
+10 Wits.

You may choose from:
1) Predator reactions gain +20% Critical Chance, and twice per round, emulate the effects of Corpse Explosion that only harms enemies, and once per round, create a corpse.
2) Vitality Void summons an Empowered Boneshaped Skitterer on up to 2 corpses within 8m. It has improved stats, points into Necromancer, Attack of Opportunity, and deals double damage upon dying. This effect is limited to once per round.
3) Once per round, per target, any non-zero amount of damage you deal applies at least two stacks of Battered and Harried.
» +10 Wits.

1) Predator reactions gain +20% Critical Chance and, once per round, recover 2AP.

You may choose from:
1) While wielding a melee weapon, Centurion reactions become 5m Whirlwinds and their range is extended to 5m.
2) While you have Prosperity, gain an Empowered Bouncing Shield skill that costs 2AP, has a 1 turn cooldown, deals 50% more damage, and can ricochet to 3 other enemies within 8m.
3) Wearing a shield no longer decreases your damage gain from Power.
» +10 Power.

» While wielding a melee weapon, Centurion reactions become 5m Whirlwinds and their range is extended to 5m.

Your enemies circle like wolves.

» The balanced experience.
» Enemy damage is increased. Bosses will deal more damage.
» Enemy armor and vitality are increased.
» Bosses gain +2 AP Recovery.
» Celestial healing effect is reduced by 35%.
» Bosses will always infuse with at least 2 Source Points.

Do not hide, the shadows smell your blood.

» The drunk experience.
» Enemy damage is increased.
» Non-boss enemies gain +2 AP Recovery.
» Enemies will always infuse with 3 Source Points.

You will lose everything.

» The veteran experience.
» Enemy armor and vitality are increased.
» Celestial healing effect is reduced by 50%.
» Enemies will always infuse with at least 2 Source Points.

Wrest your destiny from the fist of the Void.

» The basic experience.
» Enemy damage, resistances, armor, and vitality are increased. Bosses have more damage, armor, and vitality.
» Enemies have +2 AP Recovery.
» Enemies have access to more skills.
» Celestial healing effect is reduced by 25%.
» When using a skill that can be infused, enemies will always infuse it with at least 1 Source Point, regardless of whether or not they have enough Source.
» Improved Enemies is enabled.
» Resistance DR is set to 100.

Click on this node again to allocate it, granting:
» Source Infusion 1: When you cast Cannibalize on a controllable summon that is within 13m of 2 of your own totems, sacrifice those totems and apply Withered for 1 turn to all enemies in combat with you. Then, gain +50% damage while you emulate the effects of Horrid Wilting on all enemies you can see. Recover 1SP.
sacrificed 2 totems to apply Wither to all enemies in combat, and emulate Horrid Wilting on enemies seen.

Lifesteal and damage is increased. At the end of its turn, this character performs a free Mosquito Swarm reaction on the nearest character it can see; if it is an ally, Feast is applied to that character.

With [1], you activate Vitality Void when you suffer your fourth stack of Battered or Harried (combined total) in a single turn.
Vitality Void is a power that can be augmented through the Ascension feature.

[1] grants you +15% lifesteal, and you consume contiguous blood puddles that you stand in, healing you for 5% of your maximum vitality. Additionally, at the start of your turns, after 0.5s, gain 50% of your Voracity's intended values.
Voracity is a power that can be augmented through the Ascension feature.

While wielding a bow, crossbow, or wand, basic attacks and special arrows will inflict 20% bonus elemental damage depending on the surface your target is standing in and apply its corresponding statuses for 2 turns. If your Elemental Arrowheads status matches the surface your target is standing in, also recover 1AP.
Additionally, you recover the first two special arrows each round, and your special arrows also count as basic attacks.
AP recovery from basic attacks may never reduce the net-cost to less than 2 AP.

Elementalist:

» 1 AP reaction, elemental damage to all enemies within 2m of the reaction's target. Then gain 1 stack of Elementalist, or 2 if using the same element twice in a row.
» Reaction: Reactions activate automatically when their conditions are satisfied, but only do so when it is not your turn; you can only perform one at a time.

Click on this node again to allocate it, granting:
» Upon reaching 10 stacks of Elementalist, spend 5 stacks to activate Purity, or if it's on cooldown, reduce its remaining cooldown by 1.

Gain:
» +0.4 Movement Speed.
» +3% Maximum Vitality.

Additionally, you may choose from:
1) Benevolence restores 15% of missing Vitality and grants +10% elemental resistances for 1 turn, to each target.
2) When you remove 3 stacks of Battered and/or Harried with Benevolence, activate Purity. Once per round, if Purity is on cooldown, reduce its remaining cooldown by 1.
3) Upon reaching 10 stacks of Elementalist, spend 5 stacks to activate Purity, or if it's on cooldown, reduce its remaining cooldown by 1.
